waiver.title: Deferred identity proof CAS dereference at admission
waiver.description:
Permits authoritative handlers (IngestReviewReceipt, DelegateSublease)
to validate identity_proof_hash as a shape-only commitment (32-byte
non-zero) without dereferencing from CAS or executing
IdentityProofV1::verify() at admission time.

Full CAS dereference + cryptographic verification requires CAS
transport integration, which is delivered by TCK-00359 (verifier
cache contract and invalidation correctness). Until then, the hash
acts as a binding commitment â€” callers attest they hold a valid
proof by providing its hash, and the hash is bound into signed
ledger events for audit.

This waiver expires automatically and MUST be renewed or replaced
by CAS-backed proof verification.
conditions: Only applies to identity_proof_hash validation in privileged handlers
Hash must be exactly 32 bytes and non-zero (shape validation)
Hash must be bound into ALL signed ledger event payloads
Must be renewed or replaced before expiry
IdentityProofV1::verify() exists and is tested but not wired to handlers
